snippet: With the new “Chicago Fire,” the producer Dick Wolf is moving toward more serial stories and away from the strict procedural style of “Law & Order,” which made him famous.
abstract: Law & Order creator Dick Wolf is moving away from a strict procedural style to more serial storytelling with his latest television series Chicago Fire; show hinges as much on the messy personal lives of firefighters and paramedics as on the fires, car accidents and other calamities they handle.
lead_paragraph: With the new “Chicago Fire,” the producer Dick Wolf is moving toward more serial stories and away from the strict procedural style of “Law & Order,” which made him famous.

headline.seo: ‘Chicago Fire’ and the Changing Dick Wolf
headline.main: Dick Wolf’s Drama: This Is His Story
headline.print_headline: Dick Wolf’s Drama: This Is His Story
